The image purports to show a screenshot: with a translation of the Urdu-language text stating that Afghanistan announced a $30 million aid package for Pakistan to combat coronavirus.
Rana Jawad: Director of News at Geo TV, confirmed that the image is fabricated and that the network did not air such a news report.
Pakistan: s Ministry of Information and Broadcasting posted on Twitter that the claim in the posts was false, accompanied by a screenshot of the image with a "FAKE NEWS" stamp overlay.
